about_the_game: Explore the inspiration and early concept art for Ara: History Untold. This bonus content is included with purchase of the Ara: History Untold Premium Edition.
detailed_description: Explore the inspiration and early concept art for Ara: History Untold. This bonus content is included with purchase of the Ara: History Untold Premium Edition.
name: Ara: History Untold Digital Art Book

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (20H1) or later
  • Processor: Windows 10 (20H1) or later
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 480 – Nvidia GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • DirectX: Version 12

esrb.descriptors:
Mild Violence
Alcohol Reference
Use of Tobacco

short_description: This bonus content is included with purchase of the Ara: History Untold Premium Edition.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese*, Korean*, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish, Vietnamese, Malay
*languages with full audio support
